ComicInfo.Summary: Exotic locations, gorgeous super-heroines and blood-drenched battles await as the incredible “Dark Matter” tale comes to a most shocking, and cataclysmic conclusion! In the heart of the Promethea building in downtown Miami, the War Goddess Pandora, the mystical swamp witch Anathema and the woman-spider Widow must face the overwhelming, demon-spawned fury of Hellina, with the fate of our dimension hanging in the balance. But everything we thought we knew is about to be shattered, as a most gut-wrenching truth is revealed which will take the sexy sirens’ fight for survival to a whole new level of desperation, horror and heart-break! This epic saga is written by Mike (Lady Death) Wolfer and featured the art of Pow Rodrix wrapped in a stunning new cover by Matt Martin! Available with a Regular or Gore cover by Matt Martin, as well as a Wraparound and a special Art Nouveau Retailer Order Incentive by painter Michael Dipascale!
